mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.date AS "date", a.zyys AS "zyys", a.zyysqzggwslb AS "zyysqzggwslb", a.zyzlys AS "zyzlys", a.zyzlysqzggwslb AS "zyzlysqzggwslb", a.zcqkys AS "zcqkys", a.qdqkyspxhgzdrs AS "qdqkyspxhgzdrs", a.zchs AS "zchs", a.zcs AS "zcs", a.yss AS "yss", a.zys AS "zys", a.jyys AS "jyys", a.yxys AS "yxys", a.kfzls AS "kfzls", a.qtwsjsry AS "qtwsjsry"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_wsjsrygc( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, date, zyys, zyysqzggwslb, zyzlys, zyzlysqzggwslb, zcqkys, qdqkyspxhgzdrs, zchs, zcs, yss, zys, jyys, yxys, kfzls, qtwsjsry ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{date}, #{zyys}, #{zyysqzggwslb}, #{zyzlys}, #{zyzlysqzggwslb}, #{zcqkys}, #{qdqkyspxhgzdrs}, #{zchs}, #{zcs}, #{yss}, #{zys}, #{jyys}, #{yxys}, #{kfzls}, #{qtwsjsry} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_wsjsrygc SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, date = #{date}, zyys = #{zyys}, zyysqzggwslb = #{zyysqzggwslb}, zyzlys = #{zyzlys}, zyzlysqzggwslb = #{zyzlysqzggwslb}, zcqkys = #{zcqkys}, qdqkyspxhgzdrs = #{qdqkyspxhgzdrs}, zchs = #{zchs}, zcs = #{zcs}, yss = #{yss}, zys = #{zys}, jyys = #{jyys}, yxys = #{yxys}, kfzls = #{kfzls}, qtwsjsry = #{qtwsjsry} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE ironfo_wsjsrygc SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks},
date = #{date}, zyys = #{zyys}, zyysqzggwslb = #{zyysqzggwslb}, zyzlys = #{zyzlys}, zyzlysqzggwslb = #{zyzlysqzggwslb}, zcqkys = #{zcqkys}, qdqkyspxhgzdrs = #{qdqkyspxhgzdrs}, zchs = #{zchs}, zcs = #{zcs}, yss = #{yss}, zys = #{zys}, jyys = #{jyys}, yxys = #{yxys}, kfzls = #{kfzls}, qtwsjsry = #{qtwsjsry} WHERE id = #{id}
